channel.title: I need help really badly
channel.description:
hey people what is happen well i came to ask all of you how do you close the connection of the server then reopen it though a single bat file this is also know as restarting the server this is what my bat file says so far i put a timer on it [code]:Restart cls java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3. 0.17-ga-bin.jar server
ping localhost -n 7200 > nul
[/code] the [code]ping localhost -n 7200 > nul[/code] is what you use to restart the server every 2 hours well i am trying to make it work like that well i need help from some that know really well about .bat files so they can tell me how to close the server for like 10 sec's then the server connections reopen and restarts thanks for reading i also think i might of help some people though to... well again thanks for reading and leave a post if you know what to do thanks

item.title: I need help really badly
item.dc:creator: @darkgama13 darkgama13
item.description:
@darkgama13 wrote:

hey people what is happen well i came to ask all of you how do you close the connection of the server then reopen it though a single bat file this is also know as restarting the server this is what my bat file says so far i put a timer on it

cls
java -Xmx1024m -cp
.;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.
0.17-ga-bin.jar server

ping localhost -n 7200 > nul

[/code]
the codeping localhost -n 7200 > nul[/code] is what you use to restart the server every 2 hours well i am trying to make it work like that well i need help from some that know really well about .bat files so they can tell me how to close the server for like 10 sec’s then the server connections reopen and restarts thanks for reading i also think i might of help some people though to… well again thanks for reading and leave a post if you know what to do thanks
